mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, HEADTITLE, CONTENTS, NUMBER, BIGHEADTITLE, NUMBER, NAME FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NUMBER = #{NUMBER};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_BOARD (ID, BIGHEADTITLE, HEADTITLE, TITLE, CONTENTS, NAME, NUMBER, TIME) VALUES (#{ID}, #{BIGHEADTITLE}, #{HEADTITLE}, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{NAME}, NEXTVAL(NUMBER_SEQ), #{TIME});
